00039 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoTransform.h>
00040 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoSceneKit.h>
00041 
00042 #include "CmdDeleteTracker.h"
00043 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00044 #include "SceneModel.h"
00045 #include "tgf.h"
00046 #include "TLightKit.h"
00047 #include "TSeparatorKit.h"
00048 #include "TTracker.h"
00049 
00053 CmdDeleteTracker::CmdDeleteTracker( const QModelIndex& selectedIndex, SoSceneKit* scene, SceneModel& model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00054 : QUndoCommand("Delete", parent), m_tracker( 0 ),  m_coinParent( 0 ),  m_scene( scene ), m_pModel( &model ), m_row( 0 )
00055 {
00056         //if( !m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) )         tgf::SevereError( "CmdDeleteTracker Null lightKit." );
00057 
00058         if( !selectedIndex.isValid() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdDeleteTracker called with invalid ModelIndex." );
00059         InstanceNode* instanceSelection = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedIndex );
00060 
00061         if( !instanceSelection->GetNode() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdDeleteTracker called with NULL selection node." );
00062         m_coinParent = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( instanceSelection->GetParent()->GetNode() );
00063         if( !m_coinParent ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdDeleteTracker called with invalid tracker parent." );
00064 
00065         m_tracker = dynamic_cast<TTracker* > ( m_coinParent->getPart( "tracker", false) );
00066         if( !m_tracker ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdDeleteTracker Null tracker." );
00067         m_tracker->ref();
00068 
00069         m_row = instanceSelection->GetParent()->children.indexOf( instanceSelection );
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00076 CmdDeleteTracker::~CmdDeleteTracker()
00077 {
00078         m_tracker->unref();
00079 }
00080 
00085 void CmdDeleteTracker::undo()
00086 {
00087         SoTransform* parentTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* > ( m_coinParent->getPart("transform", true ) );
00088         if( !parentTransform ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertTracker Null node transform." );
00089 
00090         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00091         if( lightKit )
00092         {
00093                 m_tracker->SetAzimuthAngle( &lightKit->azimuth );
00094                 m_tracker->SetZenithAngle( &lightKit->zenith );
00095         }
00096 
00097         m_tracker->ConnectParentTranform(parentTransform);
00098 
00099         /*parentTransform->translation.connectFrom( &m_tracker->outputTranslation );
00100         parentTransform->rotation.connectFrom( &m_tracker->outputRotation );
00101         parentTransform->scaleFactor.connectFrom( &m_tracker->outputScaleFactor );
00102         parentTransform->scaleOrientation.connectFrom( &m_tracker->outputScaleOrientation );
00103         parentTransform->center.connectFrom( &m_tracker->outputCenter );*/
00104 
00105         m_pModel->Paste( tgc::Shared, *m_coinParent, *m_tracker, m_row );
00106 }
00107 
00112 void CmdDeleteTracker::redo( )
00113 {
00114         SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* > ( m_coinParent->getPart("transform", true ) );
00115         transform->translation.disconnect();
00116         transform->rotation.disconnect();
00117         transform->scaleFactor.disconnect();
00118         transform->scaleOrientation.disconnect();
00119         transform->center.disconnect();
00120         m_tracker->Disconnect();
00121 
00122         m_pModel->Cut( *m_coinParent, m_row );
00123 
00124 }
